servicesContainer.containerHeader: signing a declaration with a family doctor
servicesContainer.containerInfo: here you can choose a family doctor and sign a declaration with them according to the primary health care service package from the national health service of ukraine (nhsu).
here you can get a consultation from a doctor in any way (visit the office, via telecommunication, home visit, after hours).
here you can check your general health condition (ecg, eye exam, body mass index, glucose, cholesterol, spirometry, and more).
here you can choose a psychologist and get a consultation, undergo diagnostics, and receive support.
here you can join psychological support and self-help groups (average group size is 8 people).
here you can choose our public health team to conduct educational events and workshops for a specific group of people.
